content: I'm a Digital Marketing Specialist, and my top tasks include managing our social media presence, creating and scheduling posts, analyzing engagement metrics, and collaborating with our design team to develop visual content. I have a few campaigns launching soon, so I need to finalize some content and schedules before I leave. There's a team meeting on Wednesday at 2 pm, and I usually have a weekly call with our design team on Fridays at 10 am. I'm planning to take 3 days off next week, from Wednesday to Friday.
